wikitext.*:
The '''Encyclopedia of Arda''', is an online encyclopedia, owned and moderated by Mark Fisher. It has become one of the more popular [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] websites. Its articles include timelines, genealogies, root words, and a basic layout of the history of the topic. Also featured is an interactive calendar that converts modern dates into dates from various calendars.
